overview:
SecretWeapon Systems deploys systems automation and management solutions that are comprehensive and maximize ease-of-use, so that you can focus on doing business and save time and money.

We are a software and technology services company that combines unparalleled systems integration innovation with world-class enterprise software development. Our team has highly developed expertise, creativity, and a strong pedigree of patentable innovation. Our engineers have designed integration and deployment solutions for numerous private and public entities, including small business, Fortune 100 companies and the U.S. Government.

We are committed to understanding your needs and turning problems into turnkey solutions. In addition to innovative products, we offer enhanced services, including deployment, redeployment, migration and disaster-recovery. As needed, we will leverage our extensive knowledge of best practices to provide strategically-tailored consulting. Our ability to integrate custom solutions is limitless â€“ any solution for any need.

Regardless of deployment size or scenario, our intuitive products, services and consulting solutions streamline and simplify common IT processes. This results in a more focused and efficient workforce, fewer interruptions, and significant time savings. After all, time is money.
